Description: Maps a data source column or table.field to a CollectiveAccess metadata element. Mappings can carry refineries (see below).
Use SKIP to ignore a data source column or table.field.
Set a data source column or table.field to an arbitrary constant value. Include the chosen value in the Source column on the mapping spreadsheet. Matches on CollectiveAccess list item idno.
Performs actions during the import (such as skipping or setting data) based on conditional expressions. Made up of two parts: "Rule triggers" and "Rule actions."
Sets preferences for the mapping (see below).
